mapper.select: select i.dongCode, d.dealAmount, d.area, d.floor , i.aptName, i.dongName, i.jibun, i.buildYear from houseinfo i join housedeal d on i.aptCode = d.aptCode where i.aptName = #{aptName}
select count(*) , aptName from interest join houseinfo on houseinfo.aptCode= interest.aptCode where interest.aptCode in (select aptCode from interest where userid=#{userid}) group by interest.aptCode
